short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides access to search for your favorite movies and shows and their availability on online Streaming services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stream Guide Search by Freshy provides access to TV/Movies Guide and Web Searches in your browser.

Easily get access to millions of web and tv/movies guide search results with this extension.

This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Allows for custom TV/Movies Guide searches directly from your browser omnibox
- Sets Yahoo as the default search setting in your browser"

By installing this extension, you agree to the Terms of Use (https://freshytvguide.info/terms-of-service/) and Privacy Policy (https://freshytvguide.info/privacy-policy/)

Quick Tips for custom TV/Movies Guide search:
* Go to the address bar and type 'guide'. 
* After guide hit 'spacebar' or 'tab' on your keyboard.
* Type in the name of TV/Movies Guide you are trying to search.

List of Features: 
    - Manage your Search Settings: You can easily switch between Bing, Google and Yahoo search engines by updating settings via the link in the browser action modal.
    - Perform TV/Movies Guide searches in your omnibox and browser action modal
    - Perform Web Searches in your omnibox and browser action modal

Permissions used & reasons:

"Read and change your data on a number of websites"
For our extension to work, we require access to these websites we own and manage.

"Read your browsing history"
We only use this to manage browser tabs.

"Change your Search Settings"
Our keyword search feature uses this to work in the Omnibar.
